data.eml:eml: Two new species and two new records of deep-water caridean shrimps from Brazil (Decapoda: Pandalidae, Palaemonidae, Crangonidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anker, Arthur, Pachelle, Paulo P. G., Tavares, Marcos (2014): Two new species and two new records of deep-water caridean shrimps from Brazil (Decapoda: Pandalidae, Palaemonidae, Crangonidae). Zootaxa 3815 (2): 263-278, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3815.2.6
